data.default: >= MariaDB 10.0.4:  8, 1 (>= MariaDB 10.2.2 if innodb_buffer_pool_size < 1GB), or dependent on innodb_buffer_pool_size (Windows 32-bit)
data.name: innodb_buffer_pool_instances

data.default: full_crc32 (>= MariaDB 10.5.0), crc32 (>= MariaDB 10.2.2), innodb (<= MariaDB 10.2.1)
data.name: innodb_checksum_algorithm

data.default: zlib (>= MariaDB 10.2.4, MariaDB 10.1.22), none (<= MariaDB 10.2.3, MariaDB 10.1.21)
data.name: innodb_compression_algorithm

data.default: deprecated (>= MariaDB 10.2.6), legacy (>= MariaDB 10.1.24), backoff (<= MariaDB 10.1.23)
data.name: innodb_empty_free_list_algorithm

data.default: 1/2 the size of the InnoDB buffer pool
data.name: innodb_ibuf_max_size

data.default: ON (>= MariaDB 10.2.4, >= MariaDB 10.1.26, <= MariaDB 10.1.1), OFF (MariaDB 10.2.0 - MariaDB 10.2.3, MariaDB 10.1.2 - MariaDB 10.1.25)
data.name: innodb_log_compressed_pages
